properties.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet/Denver/West Adams and Arapahoe Counties/East Broomfield County; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet/North Lincoln County; Elbert/Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet/West Broomfield County; Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet/Northwest Weld County; Morgan County; Northeast Weld County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 1:57PM MST until February 8 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Denver CO
properties.description:
...Prolonged period of heavy snow and strong winds in the north
central mountains tonight through Friday night...

...Bands of moderate snowfall expected to set up over parts of
the I-25 Corridor and adjacent plains starting this evening and
continuing into Friday...

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5
inches.

* WHERE...Portions of east central, north central and northeast
Colorado.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight MST Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MST FRIDAY NIGHT
